name: Walk Your Friends Back Home
description:
It's getting late and your friends need to get home but they are kind of a useless bunch! 
You need to make sure they actually make their way back to their own homes!

~~~~~

CONTROLS:

  • X or ENTER to start
  • ARROW keys to move
  • R to restart
  • Z to undo

Make sure each friends goes into a house with a door that matches their colour!
Some of the friends prefer you to drag them instead of pushing!

Huge thank you to andimlenny for being my inspiration and also providing some help 💖 

Made in PuzzleScript
